snippet: Friends and colleagues say Mitt Romney and President Obama share personality, leadership and decision-making styles.
abstract: Friends and colleagues of Mitt Romney and Barack Obama say the rivals share a number of personality, leadership and decision-making styles, despite their political differences; both men are known to be analytical introverts in a field that usually favors back-slapping extroverts.
lead_paragraph: Friends and colleagues say Mitt Romney and President Obama share personality, leadership and decision-making styles.

headline.seo: Intersecting Worlds of Romney and Obama
headline.main: Candidates Have College, Spicy Chicken and ‘Star Trek’ in Common
headline.print_headline: So Much in Common: College, Spicy Chicken and ‘Star Trek’
